snippet: Satellite data shows that Brazil’s annual deforestation rate in the Amazon is rising again after years of declines.
abstract: Satellite evidence shows that Brazil's annual deforestation rate in the Amazon is climbing again after years of declines, rising 29 percent; issue has come to the fore in acrimonious presidential race between incumbent Pres Dilma Rousseff and her top rival Marina Silva.
lead_paragraph: Satellite data shows that Brazil’s annual deforestation rate in the Amazon is rising again after years of declines.

headline.main: Clashing Visions of Conservation Shake Brazil’s Presidential Vote
headline.print_headline: Clashing Visions of Conservation Shake Brazil’s Presidential Vote
